Dear #@#,

You may be aware that ESI has shifted from manual receipt and processing of extramural project to web based interactive system for submission, processing and management of extramural research proposals.

This system has started functioning w.e.f. January 1, 2012. In the new system all stake holders (Investigators, Programme Officers, Experts, ESI Management and Disbursing Officers) would be interacting through this web-based system.

You have been helping/guiding Council as an expert, member/chairperson of various expert/review/advisory committees/groups,task forces with your expertise,invaluable suggestions.We believe that the Council will continue gaining from your expertise,deep insight and updated knowledge of the subject area of your specialty in this entirely new initiative.

We, therefore on behalf of Secretary, Department of Health Research and Director-General, ICMR and on our behalf would like to invite you to join us in our effort to promote biomedical research in the country and guide us in identifying deserving proposals.

To proceed further in this endeavor and in order to facilitate critically reviewing of proposals related to your subject specialty you need to take a little trouble and register yourself in the system as an expert. The system is user friendly and has been devised to help you registering in a hastle free manner.

To make your task further easy we have put your name,created your user Id and password and have filled up your discipline and contact number.Remaining field you will have to fill up.If you desire you will be able to update/modify your discipline and contact number and password also.

Following are the details, you can use to log-in into the system :
User Id : #@#
Name : #@#
Login Password : #@#
Document Security Password : #@#

We are enclosing a guideline document along with this mail.Please go through it and follow the given steps so that you can have access to the proposals assigned to you.

Kindly use below link to log-in into the system.In case of any problem the team ESI is always available to extend all possible assistance.

MAILCONTENT.BODY:
Our Ref: REGISTRATION /CRS-#0 /#1

Dated: #date

Subject: DEFERMENT OF RENEWAL OF REGISTRATION-CUM-LAPSING NOTICE

M/s #2

#3

Sir / Madam,

This has reference to BIS Self Declaration of Conformity Mark Registration no. #0 granted to you for use of Self Declaration of Conformity Mark on your product #4 as per #5 which was valid up to #6.

This is to inform you that it has been decided by the Competent Authority to defer the renewal of the above mentioned registration after #6 due to the following reason/s:
  • Renewal Fee not received
    		•
  • Renewal application not received
    		•
  • Renewal application is incomplete
    		•

    Please note that you are not authorized to mark your article with "Self-Declaration- Conforming to #5, #0 or with "Standard mark" for registration after #6. You are advised to confirm compliance to the above along with the following information:

    Quantity of article held in stock with Registration Mark or Self Declaration statements:
  • Article description;
    		•
  • Model;
    		•
  • Serial number of the articles held
    		•

    Your reply should reach us within 14 days of receipt of this letter failing which it will be presumed that you do not have such material. In case, it is subsequently found that you have sold the material with "Self-Declaration- Conforming to #5, #0" or with "Standard mark" for registration on any date after the period of deferment of the registration, it will be construed that the article so manufactured or sold has been marked subsequently contravening the provisions of Bureau of Indian Standards Act, 1986 and the Rules and Regulations framed there under and suitable action will be taken as deemed fit.

    Please note that during the period of deferment of registration, you should not claim by means of publicity or otherwise that you would supply the material with BIS Self Declaration of Conformity/ Standard Mark.

    You may also opt for lapsing of registration after the validity date. In such a case, you may inform us your intention to lapse the registration with the information sought at para 3 on quantity of articles covered under BIS registration.

    In addition, the fee as indicated in registration is payable by you for the period of deferment of renewal of the Registration. You are also requested to deposit the renewal application along with the dues within #7. In case the renewal application along with fees is not received within this period, your registration will stand lapsed from the date of validity of registration and this letter may be treated as a notice to lapse the registration.

    Yours faithfully,

    (#8)

    (Reg.Deptt.)
